title: About
introduction:
Hello World! I am Vaibhav.
I am from Kolhapur and I have completed my secondary & higher secondary education from Shri Ram Highscool & Jr. College Kuditre.Currently I am persuing my BTech. in Computer Science & Engineering at MIT Academy of Engineering Pune.

hobby.about: In free time I love to do 3D modeling. You can see some renders of models I made.

work-experience.about: During my academics I have worked with BMC and Codekul as a intern and I am currently working as ASE intern at Contentstack.

experiences.title: R&D Intern at BMC Software
experiences.about: Developed an application for downloading Database patch updates manually or automatically.
experiences.subTitle: Technology Stack

experiences.title: Fullstack android developer at Codekul
experiences.about: Developed an android application which can fetch and show videos from Vimeo
experiences.subTitle: Technology Stack
